dc:title: On Pilgrimage - November 1961
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Laments that schools take up too much of children's time, depriving mothers "help from her community." Urges reading, especially the scriptures, the psalms in particular. Is encouraged that the encyclical Mater et Magistra encourages cooperatives. Thinks the U.S. policy toward Cuba is counterproductive.
